mapper.sql: id as id, po_account_id as poAccountId, po_money as poMoney, po_time as poTime, earnings_computing_time as earningsComputingTime, is_join_computing as isJoinComputing, is_computed as isComputed, remark as remark, creator_id as creatorId, creator_name as creatorName, create_time as createTime, last_modifier_id as lastModifierId, last_modifier_name as lastModifierName, last_modify_time as lastModifyTime, is_delete as isDelete
mapper.insert: insert into drt_fin_po_earnings_computing_record (id, po_account_id, po_money, po_time, earnings_computing_time, is_join_computing, is_computed, remark, creator_id, creator_name, create_time, last_modifier_id, last_modifier_name, last_modify_time, is_delete) values (#{id}, #{poAccountId}, #{poMoney}, #{poTime}, #{earningsComputingTime}, #{isJoinComputing}, #{isComputed}, #{remark}, #{creatorId}, #{creatorName}, #{createTime}, #{lastModifierId}, #{lastModifierName}, #{lastModifyTime}, #{isDelete})
